title: Data Inventory & Validation
description:
## Objective
Perform comprehensive audit of the local futures OHLCV dataset.

## Data Location
- Raw Databento data: `tmp_data/continuous_data/` and `tmp_data/non_continuous_data/`
- Existing processed: `data/processed/`
- Instruments: ES, NQ, RTY, YM, ZF, ZN, ZT

## Tasks
1. **Instrument Identification**
   - List all instruments, symbols, contract months
   - Document trading sessions (RTH vs ETH)
   - Identify timezone conventions

2. **Data Quality Checks**
   - Detect missing bars (gaps in timestamps)
   - Find duplicate entries
   - Identify bad prices (zero, negative, extreme outliers)
   - Flag suspicious volume (zero volume, volume spikes)

3. **Rollover Analysis**
   - Identify rollover boundaries for each instrument
   - Document rollover dates and patterns
   - Note any gaps around rollovers

4. **Deliverables**
   - `/reports/data_audit.md` - Detailed audit report
   - Summary statistics per instrument
   - List of all data quality issues found
close_reason: Data audit completed. Report generated at /reports/data_audit.md. 7 instruments, 37.2M rows, data quality excellent.

title: Futures Research — Phase 2 Prop Firms
description: Research reputable futures prop firms and extract precise trading constraints for strategy design.
close_reason: Phase 2 Prop Firm Research complete. Researched 9 futures prop firms, created comparison markdown and normalized JSON constraints for strategy development.

title: Metrics & Reporting
description:
## Objective
Build comprehensive reporting and metrics calculation for backtests.

## Metrics Required
1. **Trade-Level**
   - Entry/exit timestamps
   - Entry/exit prices
   - P&L per trade
   - Holding time
   - MAE/MFE (max adverse/favorable excursion)

2. **Performance Metrics**
   - Total return, annualized return
   - Sharpe ratio, Sortino ratio
   - Max drawdown (peak-to-trough)
   - Profit factor
   - Win rate, average win/loss
   - Expectancy

3. **Prop-Firm Relevant**
   - Daily P&L breakdown
   - Worst single day loss
   - Consecutive losing days
   - Trailing drawdown tracking
   - Daily loss limit breaches
   - Consistency score

4. **Visualizations**
   - Daily equity curve
   - Drawdown chart
   - Monthly returns heatmap
   - Trade distribution

## Deliverables
- `/backtester/metrics.py` - Metrics calculation module
- `/backtester/reporting.py` - Report generation
- Trade logs in CSV format
- Equity curves and charts
close_reason: Metrics and reporting modules built. metrics.py (TradeMetrics, PortfolioMetrics, PropFirmMetrics) and reporting.py (BacktestReport, visualizations). All exports added to __init__.py.

close_reason: Pine Script export complete

title: Futures Research — Phase 3 Strategy Ideation
description: Generate wide universe of testable futures trading strategies grounded in price action, market structure, volatility behavior, time-of-day effects, mean reversion and momentum regimes.
close_reason: Phase 3 Strategy Ideation complete. Generated 58 rule-based, parameterizable strategy hypotheses for futures trading on 1-minute data.

title: Implement Strategy Backtests
description: Implement backtestable versions of Tier 1 and Tier 2 strategies from strategy_hypotheses.md. Create strategy classes compatible with the backtester engine.
close_reason: Implemented 20 strategy classes (8 Tier 1, 12 Tier 2) in /backtester/strategies/. All strategies inherit from IndicatorStrategy, have configurable parameters, time filters, and prop-firm compliance.

title: Pine Scripts per Strategy
description: Generate individual Pine v5 indicator scripts for each viable strategy
close_reason: Pine Script export complete

title: Run Full Backtest Suite
description: Execute backtests across all instruments (ES, NQ, RTY, YM) with parameter sweeps, realistic costs, and prop-firm constraints. Generate equity curves and performance metrics.
close_reason: Backtest suite executed. 20 strategies tested across ES/NQ/RTY/YM. Generated strategy_rankings.csv, ES_equity_curve.csv, failure_analysis.json. Background backtests continue for new strategies. Key finding: GT_ES_VWAP_MODERATE_002 profitable across all instruments ($1.6M total), prop-firm compliant on RTY/YM.

title: Strategy Ranking & Failure Analysis
description: Rank strategies by risk-adjusted returns, filter for prop-firm compliance, analyze why failed strategies didn't work. Generate final reports.
close_reason: Strategy ranking and failure analysis complete. Created /reports/backtest_results.md with ranked strategy list, equity curves, and detailed failure analysis. Top strategies: GT_ES_VWAP_MODERATE_002 (rank 1-5 across instruments), Hypothesis_007 Ultra-Selective VWAP (rank 3). 8 strategies failed due to data requirements or negative edge.

title: Create Prop Firms Comparison Report
description: Create /reports/prop_firms_comparison.md with detailed comparison table of all researched prop firms. Include evaluation structures, costs, constraints, and key differentiators.
close_reason: Created /reports/prop_firms_comparison.md with detailed comparison of 9 futures prop firms including quick comparison matrix, detailed profiles, and strategy design guidelines.

title: Deacon Role
description: Role definition for Deacon agents. Daemon beacon for heartbeats and monitoring.

title: Backtesting Engine
description:
## Objective
Build or integrate a professional-grade backtesting engine for intraday futures strategies.

## Requirements
1. **Core Capabilities**
   - Intraday bar-by-bar simulation (1-minute resolution)
   - Support for multiple instruments
   - Long and short positions
   - Position sizing and scaling

2. **Cost Modeling**
   - Configurable slippage (ticks or percentage)
   - Commission per contract
   - Exchange fees

3. **Risk Management**
   - Per-trade risk limits (max loss per trade)
   - Daily loss limits (stop trading if hit)
   - Trailing drawdown simulation (prop firm rules)
   - Max position size limits

4. **Parameter Sweeps**
   - Grid search over strategy parameters
   - Parallel execution support
   - Results aggregation

5. **Architecture**
   - Clean separation: data loader, strategy interface, execution engine, reporting
   - Easy to add new strategies
   - Efficient memory usage for large datasets

## Deliverables
- `/backtester/` - Complete backtesting framework
- Strategy interface/base class
- Example strategy implementation
- Parameter sweep utilities
close_reason: Backtesting engine built. 5,237 lines of code across 11 files. Includes engine, strategy base, risk management, cost modeling, parameter sweeps, and two example strategies. Documentation at docs/BACKTESTING_ASSUMPTIONS.md

title: Dog Role
description: Role definition for Dog agents. Town-level workers for cross-rig tasks.

title: Research Futures Prop Firms
description: Web research on reputable futures-only or futures-primary prop firms. Exclude CFD shops, forex-only, unclear operators. Target firms: Apex, Topstep, Earn2Trade, TradeDay, Bulenox, TakeProfitTrader, Leeloo, MyFundedFutures, Elite Trader Funding. For each firm extract: evaluation structure, account sizes, profit targets, max daily loss, trailing drawdown mechanics, consistency rules, time requirements, scaling rules.
close_reason: Web research completed for 9 futures prop firms: Apex, Topstep, Earn2Trade, TradeDay, Bulenox, TPT, Leeloo, MFFU, Elite. Extracted evaluation structures, account sizes, profit targets, drawdown mechanics, consistency rules, trading restrictions.

title: Canonical Dataset Builder
description:
## Objective
Normalize all futures data to a unified schema and produce clean Parquet datasets.

## Tasks
1. **Schema Design**
   - Define canonical schema: timestamp, open, high, low, close, volume, symbol, session
   - Document timezone handling (all UTC or exchange local?)
   - Standardize column names and types

2. **Rollover Logic**
   - Implement continuous contract construction
   - Options: back-adjusted, ratio-adjusted, or raw spliced
   - Document chosen approach in `/docs/BACKTESTING_ASSUMPTIONS.md`

3. **Data Processing Pipeline**
   - Read raw Databento files
   - Apply quality filters (remove bad bars identified in validation)
   - Handle session boundaries (RTH-only vs full session)
   - Output clean Parquet files per instrument

4. **Deliverables**
   - `/data/canonical/*.parquet` - One file per instrument
   - `/docs/BACKTESTING_ASSUMPTIONS.md` - Rollover logic, adjustments, assumptions
   - Data processing scripts in `/backtester/data/`
close_reason: Canonical Parquet datasets created for all 7 instruments (ES, NQ, YM, RTY, ZF, ZN, ZT). Both RTH and full session files. Includes metadata.json and build script. Documentation updated.

title: Create Final Strategy Playbooks
description: Select top 5-8 strategies from Phase 4, create detailed human-tradable playbooks with exact entry/exit rules, risk rules, time filters, and failure mode management.
close_reason: Created comprehensive /docs/final_strategies.md with 6 human-tradable strategies including exact entry/exit rules, risk management, time filters, expected stats, and failure mode management for VWAP RTY/YM/ES Conservative, Ultra-Selective ES, and Diversified Portfolio.
